4001000.Original_Text: 모두가 기다리던 오늘! 수월평원의 최강자는 누가 될 것인가!
4001000.English_Text: Today's the day that everyone has been waiting for! Who will prove to be the strongest warrior on the Moonwater Plains?
4001000.Chinese_Text: 今天是所有人翘首以待的日子～！！！水月平原最强者究竟会是谁呢！！！

4001001.English_Text: Now, let me introduce you to the contenders of the day!
4001001.Chinese_Text: 好，接下来介绍今天的选手！

4001002.English_Text: A supernova that aims for the top!
4001002.Chinese_Text: 挑战最强宝座，冉冉升起的新星！

4001003.Original_Text: 그 상대는 신비한 힘을 자유자재로 다루는 강자, 아랑!
4001003.English_Text: And the commander of a mystical power, Aran!
4001003.Chinese_Text: 以及能够随心所欲地使用神秘力量的强者，饿狼！

4001004.Original_Text: 신비한 결정 천월비옥은 누구의 차지가 될 것인가!
4001004.English_Text: Who's going to be the winner of the mystical stone, Caelite?
4001004.Chinese_Text: 谁将最终成为神秘结晶天刖閟玉的主人？！

4001005.Original_Text: 역사적인 이 순간, 에레다의 수장인 하름님께서도 자리해 주셨습니다!
4001005.English_Text: Lady Harum, the chief of the Edeta, is also here with us to witness this historic moment!
4001005.Chinese_Text: 在这历史性的时刻，艾瑞达首领霞凛也到场观看！

4001006.English_Text: All right, let's start the game!
4001006.Chinese_Text: 好的，那么比赛现在开始！

4001008.English_Text: You'd better stay on your guard.

4001009.English_Text: Friends or not, I'm not going to go easy on you.
4001009.Chinese_Text: 今天就算是朋友，我也不会手下留情

4001010.Original_Text: 두목, 이 놈이 보여줄 물건이 있다는데요?
4001010.English_Text: Boss, she said she's got something to show us.
4001010.Chinese_Text: 头儿，这家伙说有东西给你看！

4001011.English_Text: Huh? Why did you come back?

4001012.Original_Text: 지...지...진실의 검? 아니, 그걸 어떻게 네가...!
4001012.English_Text: Sw-sw-sword of Truth? H-how did you...?
4001012.Chinese_Text: 真…真…真实之剑？你，你是怎么得到的…！

4001013.English_Text: I-is this really it? The Sword of Truth?
4001013.Chinese_Text: 就…就是这把剑？这就是真实之剑？

4001015.Original_Text: 저...저...저번에 저기 두목이 훔친 사슴 다리 그거 제가, 제가 먹었어요
4001015.English_Text: I-I... You know the deer leg you stole the last time? I, erm, ate it.
4001015.Chinese_Text: 上…上…上次头儿你偷来的鹿腿被，被我吃掉了。

4001017.Original_Text: 그...두목 변비라고 소문낸 건 마빡이 그 놈이에요
4001017.English_Text: And... the guy who spread rumors about you being constipated is that bald guy!
4001017.Chinese_Text: 而…到处说头儿你有便秘的是大额头那家伙

4001018.Original_Text: 뭐?! 크으하하하하! 과연 진실의 검이로다, 하하하하!
4001018.English_Text: What? Hah hah hah! This really is the Sword of Truth!
4001018.Chinese_Text: 什么？！哇哈哈哈哈哈！不愧是真实之剑，哈哈哈哈！

4001019.Original_Text: 너는 가서 마빡이 자식 나한테 오라고 전해, 도망가면...가만 안 둔다고 해!
4001019.English_Text: You go tell the bald guy to come find me. He'd better not run, or else!
4001019.Chinese_Text: 你让大额头那家伙来找我。如果敢逃走的话…我绝不轻饶他。

4001022.English_Text: You're something else! Haha, this is pretty good! I like you!
4001022.Chinese_Text: 你这家伙…不错！哈哈～不错！心情不错！

4001023.Original_Text: 그래, 여기 가만 있어. 내가 그...하사품을 내려 줄 테니깐, 으하하하하!
4001023.English_Text: Yes, you stay right here. I'll give you a reward. Haha!
4001023.Chinese_Text: 很好，你在这里等我。我要…给你赏赐，哇哈哈哈哈！

4001025.English_Text: My name is Mehwa and I'm the Plum Blossom Supervisor.
4001025.Chinese_Text: 我是梅花团的负责人洪梅花

4001026.English_Text: I'm sure you're all aware of the series of unspeakable events

4001027.Original_Text: 흉흉한 사건이 일어난 것은 모두 알고 계실 겁니다
4001027.English_Text: that took place here and there in the Sapphire Basin.
4001027.Chinese_Text: 最近半月湖各地发生了很多事件

4001028.Original_Text: 저희 사호는 이에 대해 비밀리 조사를 진행하였으며
4001028.English_Text: We the Saho have conducted a secret investigation
4001028.Chinese_Text: 我们四虎秘密的对此进行了调查，

4001029.Original_Text: 사건의 배후를 특정할 수 있을 만한

4001030.English_Text: to the mastermind of the events.

4001032.Original_Text: 반달호수 전역에 걸쳐 발견된 그 증거들입니다!
4001032.English_Text: the evidence we've found throughout the Sapphire Basin.
4001032.Chinese_Text: 在半月湖各地发现的证据！

4001033.Original_Text: 이 증거에는 공포심을 조장하기 위해 행한 \n각종 불법 행위가 낱낱이 기록되어 있으며
4001033.English_Text:
It's a record of all the illegal activities
performed to spread terror,
4001033.Chinese_Text: 这个证据里详细记录了以营造恐怖氛围为目的的各种不法行为

4001034.English_Text: and at the bottom, it's signed by

4001035.English_Text: the current owner of the Fishbelly Pub,
4001035.Chinese_Text: 印有现任大鱼坊总舵主

4001037.Original_Text: 우리가 이런 자를 대어방 총타주로 인정해 줘야 하겠습니까!
4001037.English_Text: Do we really want to trust such a dishonorable man with the position?
4001037.Chinese_Text: 我们为什么还要容忍这种人坐在大鱼坊总舵主之位？！

4001039.Original_Text: 임연수를 더 이상 총타주로 인정할 수 없다!
4001039.English_Text: Makara doesn't deserve it at all!
4001039.Chinese_Text: 我们再也无法接受林延秀坐在总舵主之位！！

4001040.English_Text: I think Makara has run away.

4001041.Original_Text: 뭐? 임연수가 도망을 갔어? 그럼 어떻게 되는 거지?
4001041.English_Text: What? Makara ran away? What's going to happen now...?
4001041.Chinese_Text: 什么？林延秀逃走了？这下该怎么办？

4001042.Original_Text: 어떻게 되긴, 홍매화님이 총타주를 맡아 주시면 되지!
4001042.English_Text: Isn't it obvious? Mehwa can take over.
4001042.Chinese_Text: 还能怎么样，洪梅花大人来担任总舵主吧！

4001044.English_Text: I understand and respect your opinions.

4001045.Original_Text: 허나, 임연수가 도망가 비어 버린 자리를 \n기회주의자처럼 차지하는 것은 옳지 않습니다
4001045.English_Text:
However, I can't allow myself to be an opportunist
and just take the empty seat as is.
4001045.Chinese_Text: 但是在林延秀逃走之后，像一个机会主义者一样登上总舵主之位并不是正确的选择

4001046.Original_Text: 단, 총타주 자리 또한 반달호수의 질서를 지키기 위해서 비워 둘 수 없는 바
4001046.English_Text: But at the same time, the void he created has to be filled in order to protect the peace of the Basin.
4001046.Chinese_Text: 但是为了维持半月湖的秩序，总舵主之位不可空缺

4001047.English_Text: So, until the next owner is officially appointed,
4001047.Chinese_Text: 在选出下任总舵主之前，

4001048.English_Text: we the Saho will act as one.
4001048.Chinese_Text: 将由我们四虎共同承担这一职责

4001049.English_Text: We've got nothing to worry about if it's the Saho!
4001049.Chinese_Text: 有四虎大人们在，我们就放心了

4001050.English_Text: Finally, the Sapphire Basin is returning to normal.
4001050.Chinese_Text: 半月湖终于要恢复正常了

4001051.Chinese_Text: 轮回者！你这家伙怎么会在这里…

4001054.English_Text: We'll get this over with, right here and now!

4001059.English_Text: Yes, it's the Sword of Truth,
4001059.Chinese_Text: 没错，这是揭露真实之剑

4001061.English_Text: Sura and the Holy Relic. What a strange combination!
4001061.Chinese_Text: 修罗与神器…真是奇怪的组合

4001063.English_Text: A human carrying the energy of an Advocate, huh?
4001063.Chinese_Text: 拥有神兽气息的人类…呵呵呵

4001064.English_Text: Well, I may be too weak to fight an Advocate,
4001064.Chinese_Text: 我的力量不足以对抗神兽，

4001065.English_Text: but I am strong enough to dispatch a mortal!
4001065.Chinese_Text: 但对方只不过是渺小的人类而已！

4001068.English_Text: Let's just let them take us.

4001070.Original_Text: 수다는 저승길에서나 떠는 게 좋을 걸! 전원 공격!
4001070.English_Text: You can chat on your way to the Underworld! Everyone, charge!
4001070.Chinese_Text: 废话等到黄泉路上再说吧！

4001080.Original_Text: 성스러운 생명이시여, \n에레다 문파의 부문주로서 인사를 올립니다
4001080.English_Text:
Dear holy being,
I welcome you as the deputy master of the Edeta Clan.
4001080.Chinese_Text: 神圣的存在哟，艾瑞达门派副门主向您请安

4001081.Original_Text: 유한한 지혜를 지닌 자여, 나를 부른 이유를 말할 지어다
4001081.English_Text: One with finite wisdom, tell me why you've called me.
4001081.Chinese_Text: 有限智慧的拥有者，你为何召唤我

4001082.Original_Text: 신수님의 지혜를 배우고자 감히 요청 드리 나이다
4001082.English_Text: I've called you because I need your advice.
4001082.Chinese_Text: 我们想请教一下神兽大人的智慧

4001083.Original_Text: 지혜를 추구하는 자, \n어리석진 않을 지니 무엇을 묻고자 함인가?
4001083.English_Text:
So, it is my knowledge you pursue.
So be it, wise one... What do you wish to know?
4001083.Chinese_Text: 智慧的追求者，你非愚笨之辈，想问何事？

4001085.Chinese_Text: 把这家伙母亲的事情告诉我们

4001086.Original_Text: 시로의 회귀자인가...\n여전히 예의는 배우지 못한 모양이로구나
4001086.English_Text:
Shiro's Reborn Advocate...
You're still as rude as ever.
4001086.Chinese_Text: 始路的轮回者吗…究竟何时才会学会礼仪？

4001087.Original_Text: 하하, 아직 기억을 다 못 찾았거든
4001087.English_Text: Haha. I haven't remembered everything, just yet.
4001087.Chinese_Text: 哈哈，我还没找回所有记忆

4001088.English_Text: I doubt that has anything to do with your memories.

4001089.Original_Text: 아무튼 이 녀석의 어머니에 대해서 알려줘\n파사, 넌 뭔가 알고 있지?
4001089.English_Text:
Anyway, tell us about her mother.
Parsha, you know something, don't you?
4001089.Chinese_Text: 总之，把这家伙母亲的事情告诉我们。破邪，你应该知道吧？

4001090.English_Text: We Advocates should not intervene in mortal affairs.
4001090.Chinese_Text: 神兽不应干涉人间之事

4001091.Original_Text: 인간계에 영향을 줄 수 있는 일이라면 더더욱 그렇지
4001091.English_Text: Especially, if they can affect the future of the mortal realm.
4001091.Chinese_Text: 会影响人间的事更是如此

4001092.Original_Text: 미안하지만 이번 일은 난 도울 수 없을 것 같구나
4001092.English_Text: I'm sorry, but I can't help you this time.
4001092.Chinese_Text: 抱歉，在这件事上我没法帮你们

4001093.English_Text: You've managed to find a quiet place.
4001093.Chinese_Text: 没想到你们找到了如此偏僻的地方

4001094.Original_Text: 본디 신수는 인간의 일에 관여해서는 안되는 법, 허나...
4001094.English_Text: We Advocates should not interfere with what you mortals do, but...
4001094.Chinese_Text: 神兽原本不应干涉人间之事，但…

4001095.Original_Text: 네가 찾고 있는 어미는 인간이 아닌 것 같구나
4001095.English_Text: your mother is not a mortal.
4001095.Chinese_Text: 你寻找的母亲并非人类

4001096.English_Text: Come to the Corridor in this forest.

4001097.Chinese_Text: 我会告诉你有关母亲的事情

4001098.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC
4001098.English_Text: Have you seen a ruby in your mother's memories?
4001098.Chinese_Text: 你在母亲的记忆中看到了红玉吧？

4001099.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC
4001099.Original_Text: 그건 네 아비가 항상 차고 다니던 것이다
4001099.English_Text: That was something your father always wore.
4001099.Chinese_Text: 那是你的父亲随身携带的物品。

4001100.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC
4001100.Original_Text: 그  홍옥이 떨어져 있었던 것, 그리고 수라의 존재
4001100.English_Text: It was dropped on the ground, and the existence of Suras...
4001100.Chinese_Text: 红玉掉落在地上，而且修罗的存在…

4001101.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC

4001102.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC
4001102.English_Text: She was killed by your own father.
4001102.Chinese_Text: 是你的父亲害死了你的母亲！

4001103.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC

4001110.Original_Text: 수라의 기운이 온 몸을 감싸고 있어 가까이 하셨다간 \n문주님도 위험할 수 있습니다
4001110.English_Text:
He's surrounded by the energy of the Sura.
It's too dangerous for you to be close to him.
4001110.Chinese_Text: 修罗气息已经笼罩他的全身，靠近他只会让门主大人陷入危险

4001117.Original_Text: 네 능력을 파악하지 못하고 탐욕을 부린 대가다
4001117.English_Text: This is all because of your greed.
4001117.Chinese_Text: 这是你不自量力放纵贪欲的代价

4001119.Original_Text: 더 있다가는 문주님도 오염될 수 있습니다
4001119.English_Text: Master, you can also get infected if you stay here any longer.
4001119.Chinese_Text: 如果继续待下去，门主大人也可能被污染

4001121.Original_Text: 물러설 때를 알고 행하는 것도 문주가 갖춰야 할 자세입니다
4001121.English_Text: Knowing when to give up is also part of your job as a leader.
4001121.Chinese_Text: 知难而退也是门主应具备的资质

4001125.English_Text: Today must be my lucky day!

4001127.Original_Text: 그렇게 여유 부릴 시간이 없을 텐데?

4001128.Original_Text: 휴우, 좋아! 저기 보이는 게 무술대회가 열리는 곳이지?
4001128.English_Text: Phew! That must be where the Martial Arts Championship is taking place!
4001128.Chinese_Text: 呼、好！那里能看到的是举行武术比赛的地方吧？

4001129.Chinese_Text: 这么快就开始期待了吧？

4001131.English_Text: You should do better than this!

4001132.English_Text: Are you all right? Hurt anywhere?

4001133.Original_Text: (결승진출자를 위한 다양한 무기가 준비되어있다. 어디... 뭐가 있나 한 번 둘러볼까?)
4001133.English_Text: (Some impressive weapons have been prepared for the finals. Let’s see what we've got here.)
4001133.Chinese_Text: （为决赛选手准备了各种各样的武器.看看哪里…有什么？）

4001140.Original_Text: (생각보다 다양하게 준비되어 있군. 써보고 나에게 맞는 걸로 골라보자)
4001140.English_Text: (There are more options than I expected. I'd better try them out and choose the one that feels right.)
4001140.Chinese_Text: （比想象中准备的要多.试着用一下，挑选适合我的吧）

4001141.English_Text: This is the sword of truth to offer to the boss
4001141.Chinese_Text: 这是献给头目大人的真实之剑.

4001143.Dev_Desc: E_HW_TR06_파사의 말을 듣고 충격 받은 PC

4001148.Original_Text: 제1회 반달 무도제의 화려한 막이 올랐습니다!
4001148.English_Text: The splendid curtain of the 1st half-moon dance festival has risen!
4001148.Chinese_Text: “第一届半月舞节的大幕已经拉开！”

4001149.English_Text: “There is already a lot of tension flowing.”
4001149.Chinese_Text: “已经有很多紧张情绪在流动。”

4001150.Original_Text: 과연 승자는 누가 될 것인지, 지금부터 시합을 시작합니다!
4001150.English_Text: Who will be the winner, the match starts now!

4001151.English_Text: You fool, the dawn is already bright...!

4001152.English_Text: Isn't that the death penalty? The death penalty!!

4001153.English_Text: Come on, open your eyes and meet the dawn.
4001153.Chinese_Text: 来吧，睁开眼睛，迎接黎明。

4001155.English_Text: I do not have to think that it's so hard.
4001155.Chinese_Text: 我不必认为这是如此艰难。

4001156.Original_Text: 가끔은 그저 존재하는 것만으로도 충분한 것들이 있는 법.
4001156.English_Text: Sometimes how to have enough things that are just existed.
4001156.Chinese_Text: 有时如何有足够的东西刚存在。
